resources.string: This Application was developed for the BhaktiVedanta Hospital and Research Center, Mira Road Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. The Main objective of this application was to help the Delivery Boys of the hospital with the task of keeping track of the deliveries that they would perform. The App is designed in a way to ease the manual work of the employees, at the same tme keeping Security and Integrity as a prime concerns.
Developed by the Students of St. Francis Institute of Technology:
